committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Cherokee, DeKalb and Etowah Counties, Alabama, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain forfeited Federal public lands in Alabama to any qualified trustee who will convey such lands to the current owners of record. Reserves mineral rights to the United States. Prohibits the payment of trustee costs by the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Cherokee, DeKalb and Etowah Counties, Alabama, and for other purposes.
